text: Android 15 is an fifthteenth and latest major release mobile operating system developed by the Open Handset Alliance led by Google, which was released to the public and the Android Open Source Project (AOSP) on September 3, 2024. It was released for Google Pixel devices on October 15, 2024. The first developer preview was released on February 16, 2024. == References == Category:Android (operating system)
title: Android 15
